main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Pelham, Georgia on March 29, 1958, involving an object that appeared metal and moved slowly towards the West.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a baseball., The observer reported the sighting lasted for 90 minutes., The object was first observed in the southeast and moved westward., No balloons were reported in the area at the time despite the object's characteristics being similar to that of a balloon., The initial observation was made with the naked eye, and binoculars were used later during the sighting.
sighted object: one round object, size of a baseball
